title: What is taht font ??? I become crazy !!!!
content:
Hello Everybody !!

Could You help me to identify that enclosed font please ? It looks like "Pistilli Roman" or "K22 Didoni", but it's not it...  
I used it two years ago, but impossible to find it again...

Thank you for your help !
